page.title: 04WELLINGTON
page.content: Wellington lies in the Tone valley between the {BLACKDOWN} (South) and { {BRENDON }(North) hills. The main town lies either side of the old {A38 }road.{St. John's Parish {Church}lies on this road as you enter Wellington & {The All Saints {Church,}Rockwell Green, at the exit of the same road. However the{A38}now by-passes the town on the south side. The centre of the town is a busy crossroads controlled by traffic lights.{High Street}brings in the traffic from Taunton (to the east) & continues into{Fore Street}& then {Mantle Street.}This road is crossed by {North Street}&{South Street.
